column2: "Ooh, I bet you're interested in becoming a Ranger now! That's great, just great!"
"Well, go on! You should really give it a try. I mean, you're free to change classes, so..."
"A Ranger's job is to harass the enemy, even to toy with them! You know, really make them suffer, then suffer some more!"
"It really is so much fun. It feels great, too, so hurry up and switch to the Ranger class! You take care now! Okay then! See ya!"
